attributes.additional_details: NAWT do not have any government help and rely public support, if we get 5,000 signatures the government has to look into this.
attributes.background: I have volunteered at the NAWT and they have so many animals that need rehoming and the money they spend on food, vet fees add up. And they need all the help.

rejection.details:
The Government doesn't decide which projects receive National Lottery money. These decisions are taken by independent bodies. You can find out more about how it works here:

http://www.lotterygoodcauses.org.uk/funding
